__e: And when I do, maybe I'll pay a little visit to your wife, have a go at her just like everyone else in here.
But I'll tell you what - I'll visit you every damn day if you tell me who your friend is.
You know, next time I come and visit you, I may bring a friend.
I'll make it up to you the next time I'm in town.
One more trick and I promise I will make your lives miserable from the day I say, "l do." Got it?
Well, I don't have to be in till 4:00, so... you go ahead and then I'll check us out of the room.
And I'll give you your phone back when the night's over, okay?
And then I'll give you your body back 'cause it's so important to you.
-Then you will get your son before the summer is over.
I see no reason why we shouldn't return the favor.
All right, I earned that money, and I'm not giving it back and there's nothing you can do to make me.
No, that wasn't it... and until I do what I've got to do, I'm not surrendering to anybody.
Tell me, and I will release your soul to God before the forces of vile darkness take it from you.

Don't worry, you'll soon regain your youth so as the heart of your man
I'll give back my husband what he lost.
No, I just want to help you become really good and then take you home
